name: NATIVE EXTRACTS Mountain Pepper Leaf EssenXce
description: Mountain Pepper Leaf EssenXce delivers the natural molecules this botanical species can offer in a super concentrated, water-soluble format, and is often considered to be one of the highest antioxidant sources in the Australian native species researched to date. It is also of great scientific interest as a source of polygodial. The major components found in the NE Mountain Pepper Leaf Extract are packed with antioxidants and numerous derivatives, a mix of compounds indicating a strong potential for health, wellness and beauty applications. As ‘natural’ becomes synonymous with health, this Native EssenXce creates opportunities for brands and contract manufacturers to move away from synthetic ingredients and toward plant-based solutions. With new immunity boosters and internal beauty products on trend, these Native EssenXces translate to unique hero ingredients, connecting your brand to the natural source to bring out the brilliance of nature’s design through your NPD.
